update doctor set doc_id = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_name = #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_mobile = #{docMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_password = #{docPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_sex = #{docSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_age = #{docAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doc_role = #{docRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_state = #{docState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from doctor where doc_mobile=#{docMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and doc_state != 'Del' limit 1
